About

I am a designer and business economist by training, a project manager and managing director by trade, and a creator and maker by heart.

I help with ideation, concept development, project management, and process optimization. You can hire me on a freelance basis. Get in touch!

kleinerdrei

Photo by D. Manduzio

kleinerdrei is a place for everything that‚Äôs important in the first three years of life: It combines a concept store for ergonomic, environmentally-friendly and beautiful products with a wide ranged offer of courses for babies and parents and with a midwife practice.

  • Client:
    Own project
  • Year:
    2014 to present
  • Role:
    Co-founder & managing director
  • Service:
    Concept and business development, planning and controlling, management of retail, suppliers, human resources, and course offers

Zweimeilenladen

Photo by V. Heyde

Zweimeilenladen is a pop-up store for local products and local production. It gathers the best products created within a two-mile-radius, from coffee and chocolate to clothing and accessories, to books, bikes and beds. In addition, it hosts numerous events and workshops on local production and DIY.

  • Client:
    Own project
  • Year:
    2012 & 2014
  • Role:
    Co-founder
  • Service:
    Development and implementation of retail concept, design, PR and marketing, event mangement

Abhati

Photo by T. Korf

Abhati offers a range of premium natural skincare products, with a liquid soap called ‚ÄúOne Hand Washes The Other‚Äù as the headline product. 50% of the proceeds are being passed on to buy toilets for schools in India. We developed branding and packaging and produced a crowdfunding video for it.

  • Client:
    Abhati at Paperlux
  • Year:
    2013 ‚Äì 2014
  • Role:
    Project manager
  • Service:
    Project management, coordination of creative process, concept development for and production of crowdfunding video

Arjowiggings

Photo by C. Rauen

Arjowiggings is a leading manufacturer of creative papers. They asked Paperlux to reinvent the bookmark ‚Äì and we did! The result is a playful, paper-based 3D object which is able to mark a line or even a single word.

  • Client:
    Arjowiggings at Paperlux
  • Year:
    2013
  • Role:
    Project manager
  • Service:
    Project management, coordination of creative process, production management, video production

Today I Made

Today I made was an online platform to help people share the stuff they made. From April 2012 to April 2013 we connected hundreds of makers and collected crazy, unexpected, beautiful and helpful things ‚Äì from small robots to amazing food, from clothes to web apps.

  • Client:
    Own project
  • Year:
    2012 ‚Äì 2013
  • Role:
    Co-founder
  • Service:
    Concept development, strategy, design, community and content management
